description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Shenzhen, China. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: World's Largest Golf Complex: Shenzhen Resort with Daily Breakfast & Three 18-Hole Golf Rounds
hotels.description: Enter the world's largest golf complex: set amid rolling hills and lush fairways just under an hour from Hong Kong, this resort invites you to tee off amid seven world-class golf courses designed by legends like Nicklaus, Faldo, Els and Singh. With three 18-hole golf rounds included in your package and endless leisure facilities at your fingertips, you’re all set to perfect your swing, relax and indulge all day long. You'll be spoilt for choice with a range of dining options, including refined Chinese flavours at Imperial Court, an international buffet spread at Mountain Cafe and Japanese delights at Shiki. Unwind each day with alfresco cocktails at Patio Cafe or afternoon tea at Cinnabar. When you're not roaming the world's largest golf complex, dive into one of two outdoor pools or find your zen at the Spring Hill spa village.

hotels.title: Stylish Shenzhen City Break near Metro Station & Dongmen Shopping District
hotels.description: Find your rhythm in the heart of Shenzhen’s Dongmen district, where this contemporary urban escape places you amid the city’s buzzing shopping streets and rich street food culture. Just steps from LaoJie Metro Station, this sleek urban retreat invites you to unwind in spacious rooms with city views, plush bedding and thoughtful touches designed for effortless comfort. Fuel your adventures with a generous breakfast, stay on track at the 24-hour gym, or relax in the lounge between city explorations. Get front-row access to the lively and iconic Dongmen Pedestrian Street, teeming with boutiques, sizzling street food and local charm. Whether you’re travelling for work or play, this sleek sanctuary is your stylish base for discovering Shenzhen’s dynamic spirit.

hotels.title: Modern Shenzhen Hyatt Luxury in the Heart of Luohu with Rooftop Pool and Eight Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant city of Shenzhen from the heart of the luxurious Luohu district. This ultra-modern hotel, positioned on the 24th to 36th floors of the prestigious City Crossing Shopping Centre, offers breathtaking views of the city's skyline. Experience the finest Cantonese cuisine at China Lodge or indulge in a variety of international dishes at The Show Kitchen. Explore the city's cultural and entertainment highlights, including the Shenzhen Museum, the KK100 skyscraper and the picturesque Lianhuashan Park. After a day of sightseeing, retreat to the hotel's indoor heated pool or rejuvenate at the state-of-the-art fitness centre. This hotel is the perfect base for your Shenzhen adventure.

hotels.title: Modern Shenzhen Airport Stay with Indoor Pool & Three Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Make your layover the destination at this world-class airport hotel, perfectly positioned at the base of Shenzhen Airport. Unwind in the hotel's state-of-the-art fitness centre, savour international cuisine across three restaurants, take a refreshing dip in the indoor pool, or enjoy a revitalising treatment at the onsite spa. With the bustling city of Shenzhen on your doorstep, you're ideally located to discover the vibrant shopping districts, heritage sites and cultural landmarks. For those seeking a taste of local culture, the nearby Splendid China Folk Village and Window of the World theme park offer unique experiences for the whole family.

hotels.title: Shenzhen Airport Hyatt Escape 30 Minutes from CBD with Onsite Dining, Fitness Centre & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Located just steps from Shenzhen Bao'an International Airport, this contemporary hotel offers a seamless blend of comfort and convenience. Each of the hotel's spacious rooms features plush bedding, modern amenities and a tranquil atmosphere, perfect for a restful night's sleep after a long flight. Should you wish to explore, you'll be within easy reach of Shenzhen, a vibrant city known for its bustling tech scene and thriving cultural attractions. Back at the hotel, indulge in a leisurely swim in the indoor pool, maintain a fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym, or grab a bite to eat at the 24-hour restaurant.

hotels.title: Shenzhen Airport Hotel 30 Minutes from CBD with Onsite Dining & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Lounge in complete style with a stay at Hyatt House Shenzhen Airport, a modern retreat ideally positioned with direct access to the arrival hall. Perfect for a seamless layover, or as your convenient Shenzhen base, the hotel is just 30 minutes from the city's centre. For those seeking relaxation, the hotel boasts a state-of-the-art fitness centre, an indoor pool and a selection of dining options to suit every palate. Start your day with breakfast at Omelet Bar, unwind with mouthwtering bites and creative cocktails at H Bar, and grab a snack or essential groceries from the 24-hour H Market.

hotels.title: Stylish China Escape in Shenzhen Bay with Onsite Restaurants, Bars & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Nestled among tech giants and towering skyscrapers, Andaz Shenzhen Bay is your private clubhouse in the heart of innovation. Kick back in design-forward rooms where floor-to-ceiling windows frame stunning views of Shenzhen Park and Mangrove Nature Reserve, while you recharge and soak in the bay's golden hour. When hunger strikes, take your pick from five dining and drinking hotspots that will take you around the world in a single mouthful, then check out the indoor pool overlooking the vast cityscape. Afterwards, head out to feel Shenzhen's pulse - stroll through Shenzhen Bay Park, shop at Luohu Commercial City or visit the Shenzhen Museum.

hotels.title: Elegant Shenzhen Yantian Escape near Dameisha Beach with Three Restaurants & Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant charm of Yantian, one of the nine districts of Shenzhen, with a stay at this ideally located Hyatt Regency outpost. With the scenic Dameisha and Xiaomeisha beaches nearby, you’ll enjoy easy access to everything, from waterfront strolls to cultural adventures. After a day of exploring, unwind with exceptional dining options: Market Café, set on the 30th floor, serves seasonal international cuisine in an open kitchen setting, while XIANGYUE offers authentic Cantonese flavours. Whether you're enjoying city views over dinner or relaxing with a cocktail in the Regency Club, the hotel offers the perfect blend of style, comfort and local flair.
